complaint.description: I am not surprised at the poor reviews on TELKOM. One can never get through to them on any of their platforms. Tried calling about 5 different numbers, NOT AVAILABLE or doesn't even ring. Website, useless. Cant log a query. BOT has an option to get someone to call you back but that does not work. They are a complete joke.
complaint.suggestion: Improve availability and responsiveness on all customer service platforms.
